title: segmentation fault when labelling frames
body:
After creating project and extracting frames, program crashes if I try to label frames. - OS: Ubuntu 18.04.1 - DeepLabCut Version: 2.1.8.2 **To Reproduce** 1. Create new project 2. Extract frames 3. Click on "Label Frames" tab 4. Click on "Label Frames" button
TRACEBACK

```python Traceback (most recent call last): File "/home/claire/anaconda3/envs/DLC/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcut/gui/label_frames.py", line 102, in label_frames deeplabcut.label_frames(self.config) File "/home/claire/anaconda3/envs/DLC/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcut/generate_training_dataset/trainingsetmanipulation.py", line 260, in label_frames labeling_toolbox.show(config,imtypes=imtypes) File "/home/claire/anaconda3/envs/DLC/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcut/generate_training_dataset/labeling_toolbox.py", line 702, in show frame = MainFrame(None, config, imtypes).Show() File "/home/claire/anaconda3/envs/DLC/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcut/generate_training_dataset/labeling_toolbox.py", line 216, in __init__ widgetsizer.Add(self.quit , 1, wx.ALL|wx.ALIGN_RIGHT, 15) wx._core.wxAssertionError: C++ assertion "!(flags & wxALIGN_RIGHT)" failed at /home/wxpy/wxPython-4.1.0/ext/wxWidgets/src/common/sizer.cpp(2098) in DoInsert(): Horizontal alignment flags are ignored in horizontal sizers Segmentation fault (core dumped) ```

**Expected behavior** Expected frame labelling window to open. **Additional context** Using wxPython 4.1.0. Clicking "Label Frames" button only throws an error the first time, then causes segmentation fault on the second click.
